entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-04-11 00:00:00 UTC  (02:00 local time)
End Time: 2023-04-11 02:00:00 UTC  (04:00 local time)

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Amsterdam instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Chicago instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

New Jersey Object Storage availability has been restored.   Performance improvements are in-progress; please expect that work to continue for several days but that is not expected to impact stability or availability.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues
- Vultr Load Balancer management
- Vultr Kubernetes Engine management

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.
